report.title: Record counts by taxon external key
report.description: Lists taxa and the number of records of each. Uses the external key to identify each unique taxon
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN cache_occurrences o on o.taxon_meaning_id=cttl.taxon_meaning_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# and cttl.id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id AND (o.zero_abundance='f') AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true AND o.record_status<>'R' AND cttl.preferred=true

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the report.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END
